title: Higher payload yield per mission
description: Reduce onboard generation overhead and reallocate mass and volume to mission payload.
impact: Lower bus burden, higher mission economics

title: Continuous lunar night operations
description: Maintain power through prolonged darkness with beamed delivery from relay assets.
impact: Higher uptime for critical surface assets

title: Constellation power trading
description: Sell surplus power between nodes and purchase additional power during high-demand windows.
impact: Less wasted energy, fewer curtailed operations

title: Distributed energy resilience
description: Route power across networked orbital assets to sustain service through localized faults.
impact: Improved mission assurance and service continuity

title: Enable new off-Earth business models
description: Support power-intensive operations where local generation is impractical or inefficient.
